<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Select the proper unsigned integer type from a bit size.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/select-uint-t"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Size&gt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/select-uint-t">select&#95;uint&#95;t</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/select-uint-t/#aeb4a10aa02b864dfa1579d244a055f7c"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/select-uint-t/#aeb4a10aa02b864dfa1579d244a055f7c">type</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::conditional&lt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> == 8, uint8&#95;t,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::conditional&lt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> == 16, uint16&#95;t,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::conditional&lt;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> == 32, uint32&#95;t,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="normal">                                    uint64&#95;t&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/select-uint-t/#aeb4a10aa02b864dfa1579d244a055f7c">::type</a>&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/select-uint-t/#aeb4a10aa02b864dfa1579d244a055f7c">::type</a>&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/select-uint-t/#aeb4a10aa02b864dfa1579d244a055f7c">::type</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Figure out which byte we&#39;re at in big endian mode.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92" lineLink="#a05750a81b996121bf5bd6f7bfe968027"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Size&gt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#a05750a81b996121bf5bd6f7bfe968027">getBytePosition</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BitPos) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> % 16) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(BitPos / 8 + ((BitPos &amp; 0b1111) &lt; 8 ? 1 : -1));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!(BitPos &amp; 0b1111) &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Not aligned to word boundary?&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BitPos / 8;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We need special handlings for relocatable &amp; pc-relative operands that are</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// larger than a word.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// A M68k instruction is aligned by word (16 bits). That means, 32-bit</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (&amp; 64-bit) immediate values are separated into hi &amp; lo words and placed</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// at lower &amp; higher addresses, respectively. For immediate values that can</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// be easily expressed in TG, we explicitly rotate the word ordering like</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// this:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#96;&#96;&#96;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (ascend (slice &quot;$imm&quot;, 31, 16), (slice &quot;$imm&quot;, 15, 0))</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#96;&#96;&#96;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For operands that call into encoder functions, we need to use the &#96;swapWord&#96;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// function to assure the correct word ordering on LE host. Note that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// M68kMCCodeEmitter does massage &#95;byte&#95; ordering of the final encoded</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instruction but it assumes everything aligns on word boundaries. So things</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// will go wrong if we don&#39;t take care of the &#95;word&#95; ordering here.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Size&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-m68kmccodeemitter-cpp-/m68kmccodeemitter/#a642ca54e0f1605190dcf5a216d2b10b6"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> M68kMCCodeEmitter::encodeRelocImm(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> OpIdx,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Special handlings for sizes smaller than a word.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> &lt; 16) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LabelOffset = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (InsertPos &lt; 16)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the patch point is at the first word, PC is pointing at the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// next word.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="normal">        LabelOffset = InsertByte - 2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (InsertByte % 2)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Otherwise the PC is pointing at the first byte of this word.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// So we need to consider the offset between PC and the fixup byte.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="normal">        LabelOffset = 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
